verses.verse: How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> does not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H1870>path<s%> of <S%H2400>sinners,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of <S%H9238>scoffers!<s%>
But his <S%H2656>delight<s%> is in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And in His <S%H8451>law<s%> he <S%H1897>meditates<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And he will be like a <S%H6086>tree<s%> [firmly] <S%H8362>planted<s%> by <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> <S%H5414>yields<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> in its <S%H6256>season,<s%> And its <S%H5929>leaf<s%> does not <S%H5034>wither;<s%> And in <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H6213>does,<s%> he <S%H6743>prospers.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are not <S%H3651>so,<s%> But they are like <S%H4671>chaff<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5086>drives<s%> <S%H5086>away.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will not <S%H6965>stand<s%> in the <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> But the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will perish.
